title: Dynamic Queue, the bane of new players
body:
So as much as my other one was a joke post, i wanted to make this to point out a few things.

So recently i got my smurf to 30, and decided to go play it in ranked, it's basically an account i can chill on rather than tryharding, and there is something major to be noticed.

http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=Valor%20Carrys

Set yourself only to show ranked, and have a look at some statistics.

Game 1: Premade with a bronze 2.
3 Silver 4's on our team
Silver 3/4/5 and 2 bronze 1's on their team.

LOSS

Game 2: Same premade
Fresh 30 account, silver 4/3.
Silver 4/4/4/3 and a Bronze 1 enemy team.

WIN

Game 3: NO PREMADE
Silver 3/2 and 2 Gold 5's on my team (note my w/l is 1/1)
Silver 3/2/2/5 Gold 5 on their team

LOSS

Game 4: NO PREMADE
Silver 2/1/4, Gold 5 my team
Silver 3/3/5 Gold 5/5 their team

WIN

Game 5: NO PREMADE
First off, i am still 2/2
Silver 2, Gold 5/5/5 my team
Silver 4/2/1, Gold 3/4
This is where we are starting to get to the stupid shit, and remember this is a FRESH 30 ACCOUNT, and game 5 i am against people that are higher then my main account.

I am 9 games in on this account, and currently sitting at 5/4

I have been in games with 15 Gold players, and the main ones where i haven't are ones in which i am premade with bronze friends.

This is a system that alienates new players unless they have bronze people to actually play with, and that is fucking pathetic, cause any real new player, is going to be sick of ranked really quick if they are going against the sorts of shit i have been with.

Not to mention, toxicity has been extremely high in a majority of these games, and at least one side is flaming, and it's generally premade to out of premade, honestly think there was only 2 ranked games where i didn't report anyone.

So my TL;DR for this, is riot you need to get your shit together and either give us solo queue (so that your not forcing new players into outrageous matchups) OR fix where new players come into ranked (Mid bronze is probably more viable, especially since being low silver can easily get you into games with golds on a regular basis as a solo player)

replies.body:
So you're mad that you're doing better on your smurf than you've done on your main?

Its probably because your smurf has a very small champion pool due to champions owned and so you're always playing your best champs.

1. I'm not playing my best champs, i'm picking up champions to dick around on, as i said this is a dick around account, the only champ i have that i'm good on is Ekko, and that was so i didn't get bored leveling the account up (i would have gotten bored but i find ekko extremely fun)
2. I just finished my provisionals, i am now silver 4, so i haven't moved in rank from the starting point, and have played with a bunch of gold players.
Fair enough mate, So just out of curiosity did you end up 5w 5l and Silver 4?
As an added note, i love the 15+ minute queue timers to get my secondary role, can't wait till autofill actually kicks in.

Only pick fill, then carry when DQ gives you support.

Que times too long? Pick fill anyway. 
Don't want to fill? Play with 5man premade.
Premade taking too long? Play 5man normals.
MMR is all over the place until you play about 30~ games. Btich about it then, this is a side affect of ALL rating systems in all games and in other competition like chess.

This has nothing to do with MMR, and more to do with the fact that Dynamic queue allows this shit to a larger extent.

Simply because premades are bigger they have let the MMR go a lot, like it's not like no one else has a rank that isn't being taken into account.

This is OCE, the region with the smallest population, and barely anyone plays ranked. What do you want Riot to do about that?

Remove Normal Blind?
Pay people to play ranked?
BRING BACK SOLO Q?

Lol no, they continue to screw tiny servers MMR with this combined solo/party que system, just accept it.
